description.value:
With your experience as a performer, you can keep a set of medical tools handy at all times. You can wear a healer's toolkit as part of any costume or disguise. Creatures will generally only notice the toolkit it if they use a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] action and succeed at a @Check[perception|against:performance|traits:secret] check against your Performance DC. In addition, you can realize at the last moment when you should just be pretending to avoid doing any lasting harm.

When you critically fail a Medicine check to Administer First Aid, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Disease], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Poison], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Wounds], you can attempt a @Check[performance|against:perception] check against the patient's Perception DC. On a success, your critical failure at the Medicine check becomes a failure.
